product_name: Case Cutlery ARL Dark Oak Wood TrapperLock Knife
long_description: The ARL Dark Oak Wood TrapperLock Knife features a locking clip blade and a beautiful reclaimed-wood handle. It's the only knife you'll ever need for cutting tasks at the campsite.
short_description: The ARL Dark Oak Wood TrapperLock Knife features a locking clip blade and a beautiful reclaimed-wood handle. It's the only knife you'll ever need for cutting tasks at the campsite.
